content: This Asian country's name literally means "Land of the Free". It is also the only Southeast Asian country that has never been colonized by a European nation.

I think the country you're referring to is Thailand. The name "Thailand" literally means "Land of the Free," and it's indeed the only Southeast Asian country that has never been colonized by a European power. Thailand was able to maintain its independence through a combination of diplomatic maneuvers and strategic alliances during the colonial era.
